item.description: 테스트 페이지 입니다. Example # {{</* mermaid [class="text-center"]*/>}} stateDiagram-v2 State1: The state with a note note right of State1 Important information! You can write notes. end note State1 --> State2 note left of State2 : This is the note to the left. {{</* /mermaid */>}} mermaid.initialize({ "flowchart": { "useMaxWidth":true }, "theme": "base" } ) stateDiagram-v2 State1: The state with a note note right of State1 Important information!
